DESCRIPTION: You can use light, less-restrictive armor that still allows agile movement.
You can use moderate but more restrictive armor that still allows some agility.
You can use armors that are heavy and do not allow agile movement but offer the most protection against physical attack.
You can wield a shield to augment your protection in battle.
You can wear light and medium armor and use shields, but you will not use anything made of metal as it disconnects you from your connection with Nature.
You are not trained in the use of any armor.
